Hi everyone, I'm on Xperia M2 and my Video app is on version 8.0.A.2.4. But I see here that latest version is 9.x. And nor play store neither update center show any updates. Does that mean that my device is not supported anymore? Or is there anything I can do to update the app?
Hi Sony Video Beta Team Today I'm thinking about Video Beta Application One More Suggestions for you, Including Hide Video Options Just Like Sony Album Apps
Need manual codec available. Cause it don't support ac3 audio. none of my that HD sound quality movie have sound on video
It would be better if you have changed the layout of the main screen to cards with the purpose of (Materia Design) as the other applications of Sony (What's New and Music).
Please...... Add this button.
Pls add option to choose theme . Light and dark theme
Plase add \ mark feature\ when we long press videos,so we can delete mupltiple videos
Add aspect ratio options for play back and please cover all damn video formats.
quick play button for the last video or movie played
It would be great this option, why hide a video in the app (Album) he still appears in the application (Video).

I would kindly suggest.. U bring back the play back at the top of the app.. Showing a preview.. It used to look cool.. Now at the top no it only displays previous played videos.. Shuffling as if it's an album.. Quite disappointed
Why can't I play my videos?
Please work on the sound and video difference and when you pause a video then play it after a while it lags /takes time to play

According to all the members of this community, got some combined suggestions...1.In built gesture control for brightness, volume, fast forward and rewind2.Support for AC3, DivX and Xvid decoders3.Fix for Cannot play video in My Stream section4.Add a lock screen feature5.A screen capture feature6.Manual orientation option7.White landing page8.4k videos cannot be played in latest update; please fix9.Not smooth when swiping forwards and backwards; fix needed10.On screen option to set the screen size; 16:9 or 4:3...11.Option to set quality for the My Stream section as the videos are shown in low quality12. Option to add subtitles via external files

Still doesn't fix the wrong Sorting on Folder if it's in Alphabetical.

When using seekbar, it doest play exact frame usually. But it goes some secend back.It's annoying

Now if i want speeding videos, i must click 2 times, bcause for the first one, that thumbnail errorSorry for bad englishhope u can understandSee video below

Found Bugs on the Latest Beta release- When deleting a video from the main screen the Video thumbnail remains visible on the screen. It only disappers when navigating to other menus or exiting the app-PlayStation Video Thumbnails takes some time to populate under My Streams Tab. Crackle (awful video service) however shows up immediately under My Stream Tab-There is a lag in the video playback while seeking a point in the video. The audio plays just fine but the video freezes then it catches up with the audio playback.Tested on Xperia Z3C (5.1.1)

Hi I have noticed some problems with video app 3-4 months ago. I used to be able to play mp4 file with SRT subtitle file with no problem but now subtitle keeps disappear or doesn't show, even worse the film went dark screen and other video with no subtitle cannot be played (seems like SRT file in the same folder of the film with the same name effects the rest of the movies files and app). I wonder why sub feature does not work any more. Is it a bug?and why many updates since never seemed to fix this issue. Any advice please?

the video player has some issue with sound..while i play videos in between around 5-6 min thers a wierd sound for a second as if the movie is been played on a scratched dis..ALSO PLZZ GET FULL SCREEN MODE BACK..ITS REALY ANNOYN..THE VIDEO PLAYER HAS BEST SOUND THAN ANY OTHER VIDEO PLAYER I TRYD...JUST COZ OF NO FULL SCREEN MOD I HAVE TO USE MX VIDEO PLAYER

1,5 month since previous beta version and the new thing is just history folder? Seriously? So many unsupported video formats and subtitles issue still reamins and you di this....? Worst then before!!! See in screenvideo. In MX Player everythig goes fine but in Video app subtitles are after video duration skipping frozen or not shown at all. This is nightmare. It has a long way to become just a normal video player and not yet my default. I have no time, mood. Im done. In Music app, Movie creator, Album, Sketch, TrackID or LIfelog the progress is seen at least but here just big nothing. Sorry. :(

DETECTED UNPLAYABLE VIDEO despite there are many unsupported video formats (mov, ogv, wmv, flv, mpg - hopefully in near future will be some kind of codec included into player to support most common formats) theres glitch with video detection. as you can se in video, video app detects video which is unplayable (also I am not able to see info about it!) but it shows in video list. why? when its not supported it shouldnt be visible, should it?
SUBTITLES ISSUE ISSUE subtitles are still shown till new show. And also after their time's over. See in video. Next post will be the same section but with another player.

INDEXING I have issue with indexing files. When I download video via browser (using opera) it doesn't show up in video app in recently (new) added files. But in other player (mx player) it does. So it's not browser glitch since not-yours player detects video and yours not. And there's no refresh button to force rescan.
There Is Some File With MKV Formate Work And Some Not Working And Some Is Working But It;s Is Lagging And None Of Them Have The Subtitles Whthere It In The Video(File) Or In File .srt PLease Fix T_T

Ver 9.4.A.0.4Beta is nice. It's the first of the trio media apps to introduce light theme. Many things reported by user have been improved in right direction. Good job :)I only have a couple of suggestions now:1- Home screen should have white background to make UI more consistent2- Why isn't the header which show recent video not animated like before? I think this is the Video app not Album so everything should be animated from video thumbnails to header bar to video name (those that are too long)3- Side menu could have semi-transparant background like What's new but it's not mandatory, I just want a more consistent UI across apps. Music start to use main purple color with green accent color in the UI which I think is nice so why don't Video and Album do the same? (like red-cyan and yellow-blue for example)The rest is good. Keep up your good work.

We are going to start Video9.3 Beta testing from W26.Video9.3 beta is available for Sony Xperia devices of not only Android version 5.0 and later but also Android version 4.2, 4.3, 4.4.However, there is some limitations on Sony Xperia devices of Android version 4.2, 4.3 and 4.4.Here is limitation items of Video 9.3 beta version on Sony Xperia devices of Android version 4.2, 4.3 and 4.4.1. PS Video feature is not available. You cannot download and watch PS Video purchased contents.2. Odekake playback in Japanese specific feature is not stable.If you are a heavy user of PS Video service and Odekake feature, please pay attention.When you want to use PS Video service and Odekake feature again, please uninstall Video9.3 beta once.Of course, you can try all features on Sony Xperia devices of Android version 5.0 and later.Please wait a little more until Video9.3 beta is ready.

The following issue is currently under discussion on sony walkman and album beta pages and belongs to video, too: user interface. 1. Will it be possible to switch between light and dark theme? 2. The standard material design is beautiful, but it doesn't completely suit xperia phones. The What's new team had the best ideas to find a solution between material design and xperia mobiles with glass front/back, I think: transparent material design. Please think about redesigning the media apps. I bought a flagship device with premium design, so I expect a premium ui, too. And an option for the user to choose only a few options like transparent or not and light or dark would make nearly everyone happy

I use the TV Side View app a lot for my Bravia, this feature is not in the BETA video 9.4. Would it be making a come back?I liked how apps were linked together, like PS Video, My Videos and TV Side View. It meant that you could open one app, mainly for video entertainment and be able to access all things related without to much hassle. I stream from my NAS be it on to phone, but can in the same app quickly minimise the screen and jump into Side View to control the TV if needs be! The linking of apps is something that I think is a really great feature for ease of use, rather than having to close and navigate to to another app. Basically jumping back and forth. For this reason I have reverted back to the standard Video app. But hopefully these features will make a return in the BETA 9.4, and I will join the program again.

Not too bad organization wise. It gets a little confusing when it goes to different video appstore/ different services goes between my videos to ps videos and it can get confusing. If it's at all possible to set up a tutorial for first time users, that might help some newbies to understand the system a bit better. Other then that, works pretty smoothly

A window for the Video Settings like Audio SettingsWith brightness bar and switch for X-Reality/Mobile BRAVIA EngineAnd... maybe White balance...
I am impressed with new ui but I facing problem streaming. I have 3g networks with 2mbps speed but I take lots of time.
I'm hoping for a unified UI across all the Sony media apps. ( What's New, Music, Album, Video and so on..)

Wow guys did a great job. I'm loving it alot. Still need to say something. Couldn't stream hd quality videos though I'm using a 4mbps connection. Really a supercool update. And my fav is the resizing of video previews. It's just like album. Super smooth. But seems like it's bit laggy. Guys thanks for the update.

Super Sony

Another feature should be Lock Button to prevent accidental touches and clicks which will surely help. Hope to see dis feature.
Hi, please add the option to hide videos

To be honest Videos app is the most underwhelming app in the 3 Sony media apps so here're some suggestions:- Please give the option to show all videos in home screen like back in movies app not just recently added. Maybe different kind of sorting for videos in homescreen is good too (by name, by date, by tag, etc.)- 3-dot menu on homescreen that contain setting and help should be move to side-swipe menu.- There should be vollume slider or brightness slider within the video playing screenAnyway, keep up your good work.
Hello dev, can u add abilty to mark video? Long tap video we can mark video just like albumDont have ability to mark, so difficult when i want deleted videos

Can you add video streaming, that we could enter video net address and watch video online?
Transparent drawer finaly :)
Subtitles aren't working when I'm playing anything from DLNA (upnp). It would be great if you added this feature.

Settings page is very empty.. Why any optional settings isnt there?Add some options for enable/disable..and after that we can have customizable video.Add something like these:1. Clear thumbnails cache2. Sort and view options3. Maximum brightness when view vids4. Security: for password in hidden files5. Screen orientation ( vertical ,horizontal, video app separately rotation,..)6. Resume on/off7. Change Volume with gesture up/downEtc
VIDEO INFO
Theme of Video app could be little bit brighter, not so dark. In lighter conditions the visibility/contrast is not so good.
CURRENT TIME while movie preview
SUBTITLES Can you add more size for subtitles? Those 3 are not enough. Or instead of current size font you could add slider for selecting size of subtitles.

Some suggestions based on latest Beta Build-Bring back the Dark theme for the navigation menu. I usually use this app at night and having this bright white background is annoying. One suggestion is introduce an option to switch between dark and light themes.-Add an option to filter which folders to be displayed in the main page. Or introduce an option to mark some videos as hidden (similar to Album app)-Add an option to filter which services to be displayed under My Stream Tab. for instance I don't have Crackle app installed on my phone and don't plan to, so why is it displayed under My Stream and under the Menu Drawer? Adding the option to choose which video stream to be displayed under that tab would be appreciated.That's it for now, thank you for the hard work!

It will be great if I can add notes (so I can add lyrics for easier reference)b) I can customize the video information by adding personal information about the video(eg when and where the video is shot, or even write a Journal like para to be able to look back in the future)2) Able to shuffle play the videosJustification:As mentioned above, I uses the app for music listening, so it will be very helpful to be able to do so3) Able to choose the cover image of the video(eg by which sec of the video)Justification:Some of my videos cover image isn't just what I wanted4) Able to customize the order of folders instead of according to alphabetical orderI really hope that my suggestions can be taken into consideration, however I do acknowledge the fact that the above suggestions is for my own preference, and not the majority. Cheers!
